title: Design System Architecture for AIConsciousnessExplorer
description:
Design the overall system architecture for the AIConsciousnessExplorer tool, including components, modules, their interactions, and the data flow. The design should emphasize modularity, scalability, performance optimization, error handling, and maintainability. The architecture should support the integration of various consciousness theories and simulation models, as well as the ability to add new theories and models in the future. Additionally, it should include a user interface for researchers to interact with the system, configure simulations, and analyze results. Ensure the design follows best practices for each component (e.g., frontend, backend, database).

For this RFC, consider breaking down the architecture into more specific subtasks, such as frontend, backend, and database architectures, to facilitate a more granular review process and implementation.

Also, consider adding requirements for testing and security throughout the system design.
